descriptionHtml:
allows you to smith arrow, it may seem a bit expensive, but it\'s more realistic.
each arrow has it\'s corresponding perk, daedric smithing, dwarven smithing, etc...
This may be have been made by a lot of people, but i feel the reduced amount of arrows and corresponding perks makes it that little more realistic, and i think it\'s just one of those missing elements from Skyrim.

if you have any ideas on mods, comment or send me a message and i\'ll look into it
author: Morzie
